mapper.insert: INSERT INTO V_RCPT_GIANTNET010( CUST_ID, RCPT_YMD, CUST_USE_NO, RCPT_DV, WORK_DV_CD, REQ_DV_CD, MPCK_KEY, MPCK_SEQ, CAL_DV_CD, FRT_DV_CD, CNTR_ITEM_CD, BOX_TYPE_CD, BOX_QTY, CUST_MGMT_DLCM_CD, SENDR_NM, SENDR_TEL_NO1, SENDR_TEL_NO2, SENDR_TEL_NO3, SENDR_ZIP_NO, SENDR_ADDR, SENDR_DETAIL_ADDR, RCVR_NM, RCVR_TEL_NO1, RCVR_TEL_NO2, RCVR_TEL_NO3, RCVR_ZIP_NO, RCVR_ADDR, RCVR_DETAIL_ADDR, INVC_NO, PRT_ST, GDS_NM, GDS_QTY, DLV_DV, RCPT_ERR_YN, EAI_PRGS_ST, REG_EMP_ID, REG_DTIME, MODI_EMP_ID, MODI_DTIME, REMARK_1, ORI_INVC_NO, ORI_ORD_NO ) VALUES ( #{custId}, #{rcptYmd}, #{custUseNo}, #{rcptDv}, #{workDvCd}, #{reqDvCd}, #{mpckKey}, #{mpckSeq}, #{calDvCd}, #{frtDvCd}, #{cntrItemCd}, #{boxTypeCd}, #{boxQty}, #{custMgmtDlcmCd}, #{sendrNm}, #{sendrTelNo1}, #{sendrTelNo2}, #{sendrTelNo3}, #{sendrZipNo}, #{sendrAddr}, #{sendrDetailAddr}, #{rcvrNm}, #{rcvrTelNo1}, #{rcvrTelNo2}, #{rcvrTelNo3}, #{rcvrZipNo}, #{rcvrAddr}, #{rcvrDetailAddr}, #{invcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prtSt}, #{gdsNm}, #{gdsQty}, #{dlvDv}, #{rcptErrYn}, #{eaiPrgsSt}, #{regEmpId}, #{regDtime}, #{modiEmpId}, #{modiDtime}, #{remark1}, #{oriInvcNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oriOrdNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
